description: Conducted research at Direct Supply as a visiting researcher.
keyPoints: Analyzed transaction data to identify patterns and trends.
Detected anomalous transactions through data analysis.
Created a system to unify disparate company names between organizations.

description: Providing technology consulting services to Family 7 Foundations.
keyPoints: Created a front-facing website for marketing purposes.
Prepared teacher and student manuals for publication.
Managed email accounts on ProtonMail and custom domains.
Developed a backend SQLite database for internal tools.

description: Offered data science consulting services to Foley & Lardner.
keyPoints: Built a series of recommender systems that helped identify missed cross-selling opportunities.

description: Served as a machine learning consultant for CoreMap.
keyPoints: Developed an algorithm to predict the most efficient locations for ablative heart surgery (a minimally invasive procedure) given a specific atrial fibrillation pattern.
